DOC.brief_title: Pre-Salpingo-Oophorectomy Pilot Study MAKO 7 Device Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , multi-center observational study evaluate ability MAKO 7 device collect cell fallopian tubes cytological evaluation determination and/or differentiation normal versus atypical versus malignant cell .

Subject must able provide inform consent 1 . Contraindication hysteroscopy 2 . Acute pelvic inflammatory disease 3 . Active recent low pelvic infection 4 . Pregnancy 5 . Delivery termination pregnancy past 6 week 6 . Known tubal obstruction include tubal ligation 7 . Invasive carcinoma cervix endometrium 8 . Intolerance anesthesia
